member.name: P:TrueWill.Fsm.StateMachine.States
member.summary: Gets the collection of available states.

member.name: M:TrueWill.Fsm.StateMachine.GetNewState(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets the new state. Throws InvalidOperationException if not found.

member.name: M:TrueWill.Fsm.StateMachine.GetAvailableEvents(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the collection of available events for the given state. Throws InvalidOperationException if currentState is not a valid state.

member.name: M:TrueWill.Fsm.Helpers.differOnlyByCase(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Determines if a sequence (which may contain duplicates) contains any elements that differ only by case. Exposed primarily for unit tests.
